static_fields.name: Buy Horizon Midsize Steel | Minase Watches | Made in Japan
static_fields.description: Horizon Midsize Steel is one of Minase's collections. Handmade in Japan, it is a hommage to Japanese crafts and traditions.

hasVariant.name: Horizon Midsize Steel - Blue
hasVariant.description: Horizon is a tribute to Japan. Whenever you go to the shore, you can see the horizon line. So far away, the ocean always looks calm. Horizon Midsize was designed for thinner wrists, a slightly smaller and very elegant alternative.
